Package org.apache.mahout.utils.vectors.lucene

Class Summary
CachedTermInfo Caches TermEntries from a single field.
ClusterLabels Get labels for the cluster using Log Likelihood Ratio (LLR).
Driver  
LuceneIterable Iterable counterpart to LuceneIterator.
LuceneIterator An Iterator over Vectors that uses a Lucene index as the source for creating the Vectors.
TFDFMapper Not thread-safe
VectorMapper Not thread-safe
